snippet.title: Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 - Banu Haqim Trailer | PC Gaming Show: Most Wanted 2023
snippet.description:
Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 is an action RPG where you'll play as an elder Vampire looking to make an influence in modern-day Seattle. Seek blood and power as you use supernatural abilities  to claim the city with first-person immersive combat and a hunger for mortals.

The PC Gaming Show: Most Wanted is an event highlighting the 25 most exciting games in development on PC. A group of 70 expert panellists including critics, industry luminaries, and content creators dubbed The Council, scored a wide range of games which when all considered determined the 25 selected.
www.pcgamer.com

Twitter: twitter.com/PCGamer
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@pcgamer_mag
Instagram: @pcgamer_mag
Facebook: facebook.com/pcgamermagazine
Forum: forums.pcgamer.com

To subscribe to the magazine in the US, UK, or elsewhere, visit magazines direct

PC Gamer is the global authority on PC games. We’ve been covering PC gaming for more than 20 years, and continue that legacy today with worldwide print editions and around-the-clock news, features, esports coverage, hardware testing and game reviews on PCGamer.com, as well as major yearly events including the PC Gaming Show at E3.
#pcgamer #pcgamingshow #vampirethemasquerade #vampirethemasqueradebloodlines2
